ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hi I'm new
ygData.msgSnippet: Is uggest going to PC, that seems to be the best place to lvl and gain money. i made 40pp plus like 300gp 300cp, it was great i grouped with some great people,
ygData.messageBody:
Is uggest going to PC, that seems to be the best place
to lvl and gain money. i made 40pp plus like 300gp
300cp, it was great i grouped with some great people,
and its a good spot to hang out cause there is always
someone there to group with.

Hunl
--- Martin Ashcraft <mrmarvinmars@...> wrote:

> hey there if you weant to lv up go to calbas and got
> to the tower and fight untill you are up to 22 then
> go to missmore or you can go to pc now and get in a
> group and do some lving there or you can go to less
> faydark or ocen of tears or dagnors cauldron or
> unrest or erud's crossing or swamp of no hope ok
> these are some area to go get lv up ok hope i been
> some help ashma
>
> greg <gregdixon@...> wrote:
>
> Hello All,
>
> I have been playing for about 2 1/2 yrs on
> Bristlebane. I managed to
> force my hef rgr to lvl 18/19--18 is where I spend
> most of my time,
> but sometimes I lvl to 19.
>
> I have been recently been building my fletching
> skills(104). I spent
> about 4hrs a day hunting in front of Qeynos killing
> green mobs for
> about 3wks. All I make is about 150plat in the 4 hrs
> with no exp, but
> when I go hunting elswere--like bb--I only get about
> 5 plat for 4 hrs
> and some exp. I seem to go up about 2 skill points
> in that time in
> front of Qeynos.
>
> I don't mean to complain, but I am starting to feel
> sorry for all
> knolls and gopher snakes I've killed. Plus I would
> like to be able to
> do more quests.
>
> I do want to earn everything myself, but would like
> to know where I
> can earn some serious plat? I have heard of people
> lvl 12 earning 4-
> 5000 plat/hr.
>
> How do they do that?
>
> Anyone have any suggestions?
>
> Thanks
>
>
>
>
